_sText:
A new modified version of my previous map: http://www.fpsbanana.com/maps/135810

i got complains it wasnt a map that was fast played. this map is more open (not camping spots) and has windows to see in and outside the building.

i placed a extra spawn on the top middle building. and 2 on the catwalk (both T and CT got 2)

i made windows in the ramps that go into the building. so you can shoot see your enemy quicker. and shoot true it.
